krpano.action: showtooltip('hotspot');
tween(scale, 1.2); tween(alpha, 1);
set(layer[logo].visible, false);
set(layer[logo].visible, true);
ifnot (controlBar_dockedThumbnailsbarbuilt, controlBar_dockedThumbnailsbuildMenu(); set(controlBar_dockedThumbnailsbarbuilt, true););
controlBar_dockedThumbnailsshowMenuControls();
txtadd(btn_bg_name, get(name), "_bg"); set(layer[get(btn_bg_name)].crop, "0|48|48|48");
txtadd(btn_bg_name, get(name), "_bg"); set(layer[get(btn_bg_name)].crop, "0|96|48|48");
getmessage(urltoopen,buttonopenurlwebsiteurl);openurl(get(urltoopen),_blank);
set(layer[button].visible, false);
if(tour_displaycontrols,set(layer[button].visible, true);,hidebutton(););
panoramacombobox_kr_openlist(get(name));
set(layer[panoramacombobox].visible, false);
set(itemtoselect, get(scene[get(xml.scene)].name)); layer[panoramacombobox].selectItemByName(get(itemtoselect));
layer[panoramacombobox].openList();
layer[panoramacombobox].closeList();
set(tour_displaycontrols, false);events.dispatch(hidetourcontrols);
set(tour_displaycontrols, true); events.dispatch(showtourcontrols);
set(tour_fullscreen,false);set(fullscreen,false);
set(tour_fullscreen,true);set(fullscreen,true);
if(tour_fullscreen,exitFullScreen();,enterFullScreen(););
set(tour_fullscreen,false);events.dispatch(onexitfullscreen);
set(tour_vrdevices, false); events.dispatch(onvrunavailable);
set(hlookat_moveforce, 0);
set(vlookat_moveforce, 0);
set(fov_moveforce, 0);
preloadsound("vitalie_rotaru_-_digital_feelings.mp3");
if (xml.scene, if (scene[get(xml.scene)].haslocalsounds, playpanolocalsounds();););
if (xml.scene, if (scene[get(xml.scene)].haslocalsounds, stoppanolocalsounds();););
if (xml.scene, if (scene[get(xml.scene)].haslocalsounds, pausepanolocalsounds();););
if (xml.scene, if (scene[get(xml.scene)].haslocalsounds, setpanolocalsoundsvolume();););
set(tour_soundson, true);events.dispatch(playtoursoundsevent); resumeTourSoundsActions(true,true,true,true,true);
set(tour_soundson, false);events.dispatch(stoptoursoundsevent); pauseTourSoundsActions(true,true,true,true,true);
